snippet: The United States asked the Saudi authorities on Thursday to cancel a sentence of 1,000 lashes given to a liberal blogger.
lead_paragraph: The United States asked the Saudi authorities on Thursday to cancel a sentence of 1,000 lashes given to a liberal blogger.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: U.S. Seeks to Halt a Blogger’s Lashing
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia: U.S. Seeks to Halt a Blogger’s Lashing
